alert.note: Alert for Rose Atoll; Swains Island (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 22 at 2:21PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY... WHAT...High Surfs of 11 to 13 feet with locally higher sets will impact all south and east facing shores of all islands. WHERE...All Islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Monday. IMPACTS...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 221 AOAULI ASO FARAILE TESEMA 22 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE ASO GAFUA... MAFUAAGA...O Galu e 11 i le 13 futu ma e maualuluga atu i nisi o taimi o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u. NOFOAGA...Aafia ai uma motu o Amerika Samoa. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Gafua AAFIAGA...Aafiaga mai Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga...O le a iai taimi e fafati maualuluga ai galu i le matafaga ma le aau, e aave foi le sami e faafaigata ma lamatia ai fuafuaga tumatafaga. E ono tutupu foi nai sologa i talafatai o le atunuu. E iai foi taimi, e ono fafati ai galu i le muliava (gutu) o le uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Puipuiga/Tapenaga Faatino mo Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga:Tagata uma o loo tafafao i le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaia e tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution
